short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks contact id from zoho and shows chat box with the contact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Catalyst Connect SMS is an integrated text message service for Zoho CRM. Users will be able to text CRM leads and contacts through the Chrome Extension. All texts will be logged in Zoho through a custom Module so users can reference back to conversations or configure workflow rules to be triggered based on responses.
